Name: amopfamily
column6: the operator family this entry is for

Name: amoplefttype
column6: left-hand input data type of operator

Name: amoprighttype
column6: right-hand input data type of operator

Name: amoppurpose
column6: operator purpose, either s for search or o for ordering

Name: amopmethod
column6: index access method operator family is for

Name: amopsortfamily
column6: the b-tree operator family this entry sorts according to, if an ordering operator; zero if a search operator
